title: Living Room Design: Mr. and Mrs. Frederick Gash
medium: Brush and blue gouache, pen and brush and black ink, graphite on illustration board.
description: Living room and library streamlined interior with with L-shaped modular sofa at lower right; built in sofa and library books in nook, rear center; simple curving fireplace and tufted armchair center left; and piano (partial) at lower left. Curving walls divided in planes emphasized by two tones of blue.
name: Drawing
